dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HJ 131 : Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: Making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2015, and for other purposes.

section.text: That the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2015 (Public Law 113â€“164) is further amended by striking the date specified in section 106(3) and inserting December 17, 2014.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives December 12, 2014.
